title: Watch Leonard Cohen’s “Traveling Light” Video, Featuring Unreleased Footage | Pitchfork
text:
Open share drawer Watch Leonard Cohen’s “Traveling Light” Video, Featuring Unreleased Footage Collaborator Sammy Slabbinck—made with the guidance of Cohen’s son Adam—created the visual for the You Want It Darker track Leonard Cohen 
Sammy Slabbinck was a collaborator on Leonard Cohen ’s excellent 2016 LP You Want It Darker . Today, he’s shared a new memorial video for the record’s “Traveling Light.” He made it with the “ excellent guidance ” of Cohen’s son and producer Adam. The video begins with Cohen sitting on his porch, discussing his health. The visual includes a combination of archival and previously unreleased footage of Cohen. Watch the “Traveling Light” lyric video below. 
Read “ Leonard Cohen’s Grand Tour and His Brilliant Final Act ” on the Pitch. Pitchfork named You Want It Darker its No. 17 album of 2016. Find the full list here . Artists In This Story
